feed.title: InvenTree Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] Add extra undefined check for table filters (#8008) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8014

Devops / Setup Changes

  • [0.16.x] Fix package upgrade process (#8034) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8035

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7991
  • [0.16.x] Hide "build orders" tab for inactive parts (#7992) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7993

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.0...0.16.1

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

The 0.16.2 release does not contain functional changes to the core, only small adjustments to the packaging process. These serve for better readability and to enable easier debugging of the package-based installs. Updating is not necessary for non-package-based install methods like docker or bare metal.

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8036
  • [0.16.x] Packager: easier to parse debug messages (#8083) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8096
  • use uv for install (#8082) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8095

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.1...0.16.2

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] Fix image upload for company page (#8120) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8123
  • [0.16.x] Ensure DBBACKUP_STORAGE_OPTIONS is a dict (#8153) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8154
  • Improve logic for automatically updating part pricing (#8090) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8122

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8121

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.2...0.16.3

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] Enhance exception management (#8174) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8175
  • [0.16.x] Remove translation for logged warnings (#8173) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8176
  • Increase timeout for report printing by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8187
  • Ensure that stock item trees are rebuilt correctly after serialization by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8193
  • [0.16.x] Exception handling for BulkDeleteMixin (#8205) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8206
  • [0.16.x] Add exception handling for default template creatoin (#8209) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8211

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8158
  • [0.16.x] Path management improvements (#8210) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.3...0.16.4

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.5
entry.content:
Security Advisories

There are two security advisories associated with this release:

  • https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/security/advisories/GHSA-vx3h-qwqw-r2wq
  • https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/security/advisories/GHSA-wp3m-jhgv-rhqr

Thanks to @febin0x10 for reporting these vulnerabilities. More information is available on their blog: https://www.getastra.com/blog/vulnerability/stored-xss-inventree/

What's Changed

Security Patches

  • Merge commit from fork by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8229
  • Markdown xss backport by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8244

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] Fix build item over-allocation checks (#8235) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8241

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8214

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.4...0.16.5
